bug.short_desc: SELinux is preventing dnssec-trigger- from 'execute' accesses on the file /usr/sbin/ldconfig.
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: I don't remember what caused this error, but i'm shooting that probably starting dnssec trigger or resuming my pc from sleep? SELinux is preventing dnssec-trigger- from 'execute' accesses on the file /usr/sbin/ldconfig.
***** Plugin catchall (100. confidence) suggests **************************
If aby dnssec-trigger- powinno mieć domyślnie execute dostęp do ldconfig file. Then proszę to zgłosić jako błąd. Można utworzyć lokalny moduł polityki, aby umożliwić ten dostęp. Do allow this access for now by executing: # ausearch -c 'dnssec-trigger-' --raw | audit2allow -M my-dnssectrigger # semodule -X 300 -i my-dnssectrigger.pp
Additional Information: Source Context system_u:system_r:dnssec_trigger_t:s0 Target Context system_u:object_r:ldconfig_exec_t:s0 Target Objects /usr/sbin/ldconfig [ file ] Source dnssec-trigger- Source Path dnssec-trigger- Port <Unknown> Host (removed) Source RPM Packages Target RPM Packages glibc-2.23.1-8.fc24.x86_64 Policy RPM selinux-policy-3.13.1-191.5.fc24.noarch Selinux Enabled True Policy Type targeted Enforcing Mode Enforcing Host Name (removed) Platform Linux (removed) 4.6.4-301.fc24.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Jul 12 11:50:00 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 Alert Count 1 First Seen 2016-07-28 16:28:16 CEST Last Seen 2016-07-28 16:28:16 CEST Local ID 5fba1d5f-68b0-4c19-af5e-db99ff33a298
Raw Audit Messages type=AVC msg=audit(1469716096.998:542): avc: denied { execute } for pid=9967 comm="dnssec-trigger-" name="ldconfig" dev="dm-1" ino=1188338 scontext=system_u:system_r:dnssec_trigger_t:s0 tcontext=system_u:object_r:ldconfig_exec_t:s0 tclass=file permissive=0
Hash: dnssec-trigger-,dnssec_trigger_t,ldconfig_exec_t,file,execute
Version-Release number of selected component: selinux-policy-3.13.1-191.5.fc24.noarch
Additional info: reporter: libreport-2.7.2 hashmarkername: setroubleshoot kernel: 4.6.4-301.fc24.x86_64 type: libreport
Potential duplicate: bug 1322147

Description of problem: Executed 'dnssec-trigger-control hotspot_signon' as root
Version-Release number of selected component: selinux-policy-3.13.1-191.5.fc24.noarch
Additional info: reporter: libreport-2.7.2 hashmarkername: setroubleshoot kernel: 4.6.4-301.fc24.x86_64 type: libreport
